sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使适合，适应"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: adapt, adjust, conform, accommodate, suit, fit
means: adapt ：指人或物在原有情况下作某些改变以适应新的环境或不同的条件，强调改变的目的和重要性。
adjust与adapt含义很接近，但adjust所改变的幅度要小一些，侧重过程，主要用于调整角度、高度、光点等。
conform ：多指与某模式或规则相符，也引申指改变习惯等以适应新的环境。
accommodate ：书面用词，指以外部条件标准改变自己或某事以求得适应，着重改变或调节的有利。
suit ：指适合要求，从而使人满意愉快。
fit ：含义广，指人或物适合或适应某一目的或用途。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"符合，一致"之意。
means: agree ：侧重指经过比较后的所有主要部分均和谐一致，无冲突和矛盾。
accord ：着重指性格、精神、语气或质量等方面的完全一致。
coincide ：多用于指观点、判断、愿望、利益或兴趣的一致或相符。偶尔用于人，强调意见或观点完全相同。
conform ：强调在形状、性格以及主要特点等方面的相似或一致。
correspond ：指在进行比较时，两个事物在某一个重要方面或细节上互相匹配、一致。

sentence.Network_en: Taxis must conform to the rigorous standards laid down by the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 出租车必须遵守警方的严格规定。

sentence.Network_en: Like most "peacetime wars" it did not conform to preconceived ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 如同大多数“和平时代的战争”一样，这与我们的预想不同。

sentence.Network_en: Many children who can't or don't conform are often bullied.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多不能或不按规矩行事的小孩常常被人欺负。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'make (something) like another thing'): from Old French conformer, from Latin conformare, from con- 'together' + formare 'to form'

entry.tran: 遵守，遵从，符合(法律、意愿等)
entry.def: If something conforms to something such as a law or someone's wishes, it is of the required type or quality.

example.ex: The Night Rider lamp has been designed to conform to new British Standard safety requirements...
example.tran: “夜行者”灯的设计符合新的英国安全标准的要求。

example.ex: The meat market can continue only if it is radically overhauled to conform with strict European standards.
example.tran: 肉类市场只有经过彻底的大检查，严格遵守欧洲标准，才能继续营业。

entry.tran: 按规矩行事;顺从;随潮流
entry.def: If you conform, you behave in the way that you are expected or supposed to behave.

example.ex: Many children who can't or don't conform are often bullied...
example.tran: 很多不能或不按规矩行事的小孩常常被人欺负。

example.ex: He did not feel obliged to conform to the rules that applied to ordinary men...
example.tran: 他觉得自己不必遵守那些适用于普通人的规定。

entry.tran: (与样式、类型等)非常相似，一致，相吻合
entry.def: If someone or something conforms to a pattern or type, they are very similar to it.

example.ex: I am well aware that we all conform to one stereotype or another...
example.tran: 我们所有人都能找到某种与自己相似的模式化形象，这一点我很清楚。

example.ex: Like most 'peacetime wars' it did not conform to preconceived ideas.
example.tran: 如同大多数“和平时代的战争”一样，这与我们的预想不同。

means.word_mean: 1. be similar, be in line with
2. adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions;

sentences.sentence: "We must adjust to the bad economic situation"

auth_sentence.content: Prior periods were revised to conform with this presentation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prior periods were revised to conform with this presentation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prior periods were revised to conform with this presentation.

auth_sentence.content: Even teenagers can feel they have to conform.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even teenagers can feel they have to conform.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even teenagers can feel they have to conform.

auth_sentence.res_content: His science training overcame forces to conform to party lines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His science training overcame forces to conform to party lines.

Sentence.sentence: In modern western societies, however, the focus on individuality and independence means that people are less concerned about conforming to (遵守) the dictates of family and culture.
We conform ( 遵守) to norms so readily that we are hardly aware they exist.
To conform to the Federal guidelines.
In it the majority of students will have conformed to the standard model of the time: male, middle class and Western.
Assuming that your teacher is neither biased nor corrupt and that her system conforms to school rules, you can't fault her ethics.

means.word_mean: 遵守, 符合，遵从，服从

sentences.en: The building does not conform to safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

means.word_mean: 顺应, 一致,顺从,随潮流

sentences.en: There is great pressure on schoolchildren to conform.
sentences.cn: 小学生有巨大的压力要去适应。

sentences.en: Her ideas do not conform with mine.
sentences.cn: 她的观点与我的不一致。

jushi.english: The two scientists stopped working together because their theories did not conform.
jushi.chinese: 这两位科学家理论不一致,因此停止了合作。
